name: Mitigation  Query Report
query:
SELECT
	MT.project_name, 
	MT.objective, 
	MT.key_sector, 
	MT.key_sub_sector,
	MT.costusd,
	MT.location, 
	MT.start_date, 
	MT.lifetime,
	MT.implementing_entity, 
	MT.other_agency, 
	MT.status, 
	MT.expected_annual_ghg
FROM
	`tabMitigations` MT
WHERE 
	MT.docstatus != 2 
ORDER BY
	MT.project_name
